mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (user_id,user_pw,user_name, address, phone) values (#{userid},#{userPw},#{userName},#{address},#{phone})
mapper.select: select user_id as userid, user_pw as userPw, user_name as userName, address, phone from userinfo where user_id=#{userid} and user_pw=#{userPw}
select user_pw as userPw from userinfo where user_id=#{userid} and user_name=#{userName}
